newsitem.title: ITALY: ALPINE SKIING-KNEE INJURY RULES OUT PERATHONER.
newsitem.headline: ALPINE SKIING-KNEE INJURY RULES OUT PERATHONER.

text.p: Italy's Werner Perathoner, winner of two World Cup super-giant slaloms, injured his knee on Tuesday and was ruled out of the world championships.
Perathoner landed awkwardly after the final jump in the first training session for the men's downhill and damaged ligaments in his left knee.
Team officials said he would need an operation, the 12th of his career.
